additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycol Distearate, PEG-12 Dimethicone, PEG-150 Distearate, Polyquaternium-10, Panthenol, Trideceth-9 PG-Amodimethicone, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, HydrolyzedKeratin, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Laureth-4, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Serine, Valine, Quercus Alba Bark Extract, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Disodium EDTA, Trideceth-12, Citric Acid, Linalool.

description: Nourishes dry, damaged, or stressed hair. A hydrating formula with Keratin, Hydrolysed Quinoa and Amino Acids works to prevent breakage and protect against heat damage for stronger, healthier hair. Cruelty Free Paraben Free Sulphate (SLES/SLS) Free Gentle on Coloured Hair Made In Australia
name: Repair Shampoo
